name: TBGame
description:
Игра создана при участии в олимпиаде "Траектория будущего"

Немного пояснения о чём игра

Пользователь играет за персонажа-куклу, которого человек унёс из дома. Цель игры - вернуться домой, но на пути препятствия

  • Язык интерфейса: русский
  • Язык озвучки: отсутствует

Планы по развитию игры

Расширение локаций, добавление других типов врагов, удлинение сюжетной ветки....

English (Google translated)

The game was created with participation in the Olympiad " Trajectory of the Future"

A little explanation of what the game is about

The user plays as a character-a doll, which the person took away from the house. The goal of the game is to return home, but there are obstacles in the way

  • Interface language: Russian
  • Voice-over language: none

Game development plans

Expanding locations, adding other types of enemies, and lengthening the storyline....

USED ASSETS:

-Big Furniture Pack https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/furniture/big-furniture-pack-7717

-Toony Tiny People Demo https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/toony-tiny-people-demo-11318...

-Low Poly Weapons https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/weapons/low-poly-weapons-71680

-Simple FX - Cartoon Particles https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/simple-fx-cartoon-particles-...

-3d models from https://www.cgtrader.com/

- Sounds from https://zvukipro.com/
